## ShaderHelper.resolveVertexTangent() method

Calculates the tangent vector of type vec3 in object space

**Signature:**

```typescript
static resolveVertexTangent(scope: PBInsideFunctionScope, tangent?: PBShaderExp): PBShaderExp;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

</td><td>

[PBInsideFunctionScope](doc/markdown/./device.pbinsidefunctionscope.md)


</td><td>

Current shader scope


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

tangent


</td><td>

[PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Vertex tangent input, must be type of vec4, null if no vertex tangent input


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md)

The calculated tangent vector of type vec4 in object space, or null if tangent is null
